thread.title: Utilities or police? Pennsylvania borough defunds cops to pay bills

title: Utilities or police? Pennsylvania borough defunds cops to pay bills
text:
Published By: Baltimore Sun - Today 
Faced with a choice of paying its utility bills or two part-time police officers, a tiny western Pennsylvania borough has opted to pay the b...
